element-citation.article-title: Prognostic potential of automated Ki67 evaluation in breast cancer: Different hot spot definitions versus true global score

citation-alternatives.mixed-citation: Robertson, S., Acs, B., Lippert, M. & Hartman, J. Prognostic potential of automated Ki67 evaluation in breast cancer: Different hot spot definitions versus true global score. Breast Cancer Res. Treat.183, 161–175. 10.1007/s10549-020-05752-w (2020).32572716
